ISSUE.TITLE: Now does not respect engines.npm
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I am currently attempting to deploy a vue-cli project built with the Webpack template. By default the package.json specifies : ``` "engines": { "node": ">= 4.0.0", "npm": ">= 3.0.0" } ``` However during the build process provided by vue-cli a version check returns the following error ``` To use this template, you must update following to modules: npm: 2.15.11 should be >= 3.0.0 ``` I was able to get around this issue by bumping up the npm version in my package.json to ``` "engines": { "node": ">= 7.0.0", "npm":">= 3.10.9" } ``` But it would be nice if ">= 3.0.0" resolved to a version of npm 3+ not 2.15.11
